item.title: My Second Post
item.description: This is text! MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$'], ['\[','\]']], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true, skipTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre'], TeX: { equationNumbers: { autoNumber: "AMS" }, extensions: ["AMSmath.js", "AMSsymbols.js"] } } }); MathJax.Hub.Queue(function() { // Fix tags after MathJax finishes running. This is a // hack to overcome a shortcoming of Markdown. Discussion at // https://github.com/mojombo/jekyll/issues/199 var all = MathJax.Hub.getAllJax(), i; for(i = 0; i \( \DeclareMathOperator{\Spec}{Spec} \DeclareMathOperator{\C}{\mathbb{C}} \DeclareMathOperator{\Z}{\mathbb{Z}} \DeclareMathOperator{\Hom}{Hom} \DeclareMathOperator{\Mod}{Mod} \) Here $\times$ is the categorical product and $1$ is the terminal object, so we have to assume or category has these.
